title: Enchanting Emerald & Pearl Jhumka Earrings - "Aakarshana Kundanalu"
materials: Base Metal Alloy with Gold Plating
AAA Grade Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Simulated Diamonds
features: Classic Jhumka silhouette with a modern twist. Features intricate filigree-inspired detailing using CZ simulated diamonds. The top showcases a captivating simulated emerald stone. The entire piece culminates in a lustrous, drop pearl. The gold plating reflects a Hyderabadi-inspired polish, lending a warm, rich tone.
colors: Primarily gold with a vibrant green from the emerald and the soft white luster of the pearl
occasions: and celebratory gatherings. These Jhumkas also make a stylish statement for modern parties and cultural events. Ideal for a Seemantham or Half-Saree function.
description: These stunning Jhumkas beautifully blend traditional South Indian aesthetics with contemporary design. The combination of the jhumka style with high quality CZ diamonds and simulated emerald gives the piece a rich, regal look. The simulated materials offer the look of precious gemstones at an accessible price point. Lightweight and comfortable for extended wear.
